levels.title: Python for Data Science

levels.title: Statistics & Probability
levels.description: Understand the mathematical foundations of data science.

levels.title: Data Wrangling & Cleaning
levels.description: Learn to preprocess and clean messy real-world data.

levels.title: SQL for Data Analysis
levels.description: Master querying databases to extract insights.

levels.title: Intro to Machine Learning
levels.description: Grasp the fundamental concepts of ML.

levels.description: Dive into clustering and dimensionality reduction.

levels.title: Feature Engineering
levels.description: Learn to create and select features that improve model performance.

levels.title: Model Evaluation & Metrics
levels.description: Understand how to measure the performance of your models.

levels.description: Get started with neural networks using TensorFlow or PyTorch.

levels.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
levels.description: Build models that understand and generate human language.

levels.description: Train models to analyze and understand images and videos.
